name: Apple Music Like Lyrics
description: Brings Apple Music-style lyrics display experience to Jellyfin web client with smooth animations, gradient blur effects, and highly customizable appearance.
overview: Transform your Jellyfin music experience with beautiful Apple Music-style lyrics. Features include responsive font sizing, gradient blur effects around active lyrics, customizable colors and transparency, smooth spring animations, and click-to-seek functionality.

versions.changelog:
Initial release
- Apple Music-style lyrics rendering
- Gradient blur effects
- Responsive font sizing for landscape/portrait
- Customizable colors, transparency, and blur
- Spring animation with adjustable speed
- Background blur based on album art
- Click-to-seek lyrics
- Debug mode for troubleshooting
